lolwut
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  lolwut.PhysicalObject
      lolwut.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
PointItem, PowerUpItem
public abstract class Item
extends PhysicalObject

A class that represents an item that the Penguin can pickup.

Author:
Anran Li
